amendment.description: To correct a technical error in Public Law 110-53 relating to emergency communications modernization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3278 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S12913-12914; text: CR S12913) To correct a technical error in Public Law 110-53 relating to emergency communications modernization.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3278 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3278 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Stevens.
